WorkItem.ClosedComment: filters have a big change for next version, please wait until 2.2.20 release for new issues (Rawr3 Filters will be updated at that time too)
WorkItem.Description: With Rawr 3 (Beta) the "filter" option is not working properly. For example, when I set the filter to only show crafted items for my feet I am still seeing some PvP and Tier 9 gear. It does remove some of the options though, and is showing all the "crafted" items.
